OMNeT++ API Reference

4.3

If you are new to OMNeT++, a good starting point for browsing the documentation is cSimpleModule. Otherwise, pick one of the following categories, or choose from the links at the top of this page:

  • Simulation core classes
  • Container classes
  • Random number generation
  • Statistical data collection
  • Utility classes
  • User interface: cEnvir and ev
  • Enums, types, function typedefs
  • Functions
  • Macros
  • Internal classes
  • Extension interfaces
  • Parallel simulation extension

If you have used the OMNeT++ before:
